title-group.article-title: Author Correction: Longitudinal study of disease severity and external factors in cognitive failure after COVID-19 among Indonesian population

body.p: Correction to: Scientific Reports https://doi.org/10.1038/s41598-023-46334-2, published online 08 November 2023
The original version of this Article contained an error in the spelling of the author Pramon Viwattanakulvanid which was incorrectly given as Pramon Viwattankulvanid.
The original Article has been corrected.
